dialogue: Steve, I came up with an emergency!
Quinn, you shouldn't have to "come up with" an emergency. An emergency is something out of your control.
Oh yeah, this is definitely out of my control.
-sigh- What is it?
I think our democracy is collapsing.
...okay, sure.
Does that qualify as urgent?
I mean, I guess....
Great! So what do you want to chat about? I saw a great movie last night.
Quinn, I told you, I'm at work. If my boss catches me talking...-
But it's an emergency.
Technically. Sort of. But there's nothing we can do about it.
What do you mean?
I mean, it's a systemic issue. One person can't really change the system, no matter what Hollywood tells you. You have to address the root causes.
Well, what about two people?
No, Quinn, I...-
What about two BUDS?
Quinn...
Two BEST buds!
Quinn, I gotta go. We'll fix democracy later, okay?
Okay, cool. I'll call you back when I have a plan.
No! Please don't call me ba-...
I hang up. Steve's such a smart guy. I can't wait to overthrow the system with him.
